result.eng: They violated the Official Languages Act.
result.ga: Sháraigh siad Acht na dTeangacha Oifigiúla
result.orig: Sháraigh siad Acht na dTeangacha Oifigiúla

result.ponchtml: Ṡáraiġ siad Aċt na dTeangaċa OifigiúlaThey violated the Official Languages Act.

result.eng: She lost her passport as well as other official documents.
result.ga: Chaill sí a pas chomh maith le doiciméid oifigiúla eile
